request_body.context: cat sitting on a windowsill looking outside during golden hour

images.prompt: A orange cat sitting on a windowsill looking outside during golden hour
A black cat sitting on a windowsill looking outside during golden hour

test_curl_command:
curl -X POST https://your-api-gateway-url.amazonaws.com/generate \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_JWT_TOKEN' \
  -d '{
    "context": "cat sitting on a windowsill looking outside during golden hour",
    "exclude_tags": "indoor, dark, night", 
    "image_count": 10
  }'
